content.title: Our Legacy
content.subtitle: Cultivating knowledge, character, and community for over four decades.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To provide a transformative educational experience that empowers students to achieve academic excellence, develop strong character, and become responsible global citizens who contribute positively to society.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To be a globally recognized institution enabling learners to thrive in a dynamic world through innovation, inclusivity, and a relentless pursuit of knowledge.

events.title: Foundation
events.description: EduNet School was established with 50 students and a vision for excellence.

events.title: First Expansion
events.description: New science and computer labs added. Student body grew to 500.

events.title: National Recognition
events.description: Awarded Best School in the region. Started international exchange programs.

events.title: Digital Campus
events.description: Complete digital transformation with smart classrooms and online learning.

events.title: Today
events.description: Over 2000 students, 150+ faculty, and alumni in 50+ countries.
